thread.title: The One Season 1 Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Netflix
thread.title_full: The One Season 1 Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Netflix

author: NewsBreak Original
title: The One Season 1 Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Netflix
text:
By Sounak Sengupta ,
28 minutes ago
Credits: Netflix Are you even a fan of sci-fi shows if you haven’t watched The One Season 1 already? Based on John Marrs’s novel by the same name, the series explores some of the most intriguing scientific discoveries that can change mankind. It revolves around the story of Rebecca, who is the CEO of a company named MatchDNA. The series does a marvelous job of intriguing fans with its unique approach and content.
Here’s how you can watch and stream The One Season 1 via streaming services such as Netflix.
Is The One Season 1 available to watch via streaming? Yes, The One Season 1 is available to watch via streaming on Netflix.
What happens when you take the responsibility to find partners for your clients? More so you also claim to have the accurate recipe for finding love and happiness in life. Although it requires extreme ambition and some delusion to believe that just science and statistics can accurately decipher the human mind and its wants, Rebecca feels otherwise. With her new DNA-based match-making service at MatchDNA, Rebecca, the founding CEO, seems to be unstoppable, as does her profit margins. But like everything else, it doesn’t last for long, as she gets involved in a murder investigation that questions the very foundation of her discovery.
Hannah Ware is cast as Rebecca Webb, while Dimitri Leonidas plays James Whiting. They are joined by talented actors like Amir El-Masry, Stephen Campbell Moore, Wilf Scolding, Diarmaid Murtagh, Lois Chimimba, Eric Kofi-Abrefa, Pallavi Sharda, Zoe Tapper, and Albano Jerónimo.
Watch The One Season 1 streaming via Netflix The One Season 1 is available to watch on Netflix. Netflix features some of the rarest movies and TV shows alongside their highly acclaimed originals. It also offers separate subscription plans for mobiles and computers to meet everyone’s budgetary needs.
You can watch via Netflix by following these steps:
Visit netflix.com/signup Choose a payment plan from the following: $6.99 per month (standard with Ads) $15.49 per month (Standard) $22.99 per month (Premium) Enter your email address and password to create an account Enter your chosen payment method The cheapest Netflix Standard with Ads Plan provides all but a few of its movies and TV shows. However, it will show ads before or during most of its content. You can watch in Full HD and on two supported devices at a time.
Its Standard Plan provides the same but is completely ad-free while also allowing users to download content on two supported devices with an additional option to add one extra member who doesn’t live in the same household.
The Premium Plan provides the same as above, though for four supported devices at a time, with content displaying in Ultra HD. Users get to download content on up to six supported devices at a time and have the option to add up to two extra members who don’t live in the same household. Netflix spatial audio is also supported.
The One Season 1 synopsis is as follows:
“Love — and lies — spiral when a DNA researcher helps discover a way to find the perfect partner, and creates a bold new matchmaking service.”
NOTE: The streaming services listed above are subject to change. The information provided was correct at the time of writing.
